channel.title: Quest cape and summoning cape
channel.description:
Idk if this is in the right spot... I'm kinda new to this stuff but... Im using the evolutionX source, and I wanna add a questcape and a summoning cape to it, what do i need, where do I put codes and stuff for it?
Hope to get help if this isnt in the right spot, sorry. :3
